column2: Fortifeye Next Gen Macular Defense Eye ZINC FREE and Whole Body Support (90ct - 3 Month Supply)
column3:
Presenting Fortifeye Next Gen Zinc-Free Macular Defense, an innovative creation that marks the culmination of extensive research, integrating the most up-to-date evidence-based scientific discoveries. This state-of-the-art formula delivers advanced nutritional support, catering to the needs of your eyes and promoting overall well-being. 

 

Focusing on the macula, Fortifeye has re formulated their renowned Fortifeye Zinc Free Macular Defense, elevating it to this new generation multivitamin and eye vitamin blend. Now, conveniently available in easy-to-swallow vegetarian capsules, this cost-effective Nutraceutical offers cutting-edge nutrition to support both body wellness and vision.

 

For the past two years, the Next Gen Zinc Free Macular Defense formula has been exclusively accessible through select eye care centers, benefiting thousands of patients.  And now, with immense pleasure, we are delighted to announce its availability to the general public. Experience the revolutionary power of Fortifeye Next Gen Zinc-Free Macular Defense for yourself!

 

Fortifeye Vitamins has responded to recent scientific discoveries by introducing a specialized zinc-free antioxidant eye vitamin, specifically curated for individuals dealing with macular degeneration. New studies have revealed that certain genotypes of the macular degeneration population may experience unfavorable effects from zinc supplementation, while others could benefit from a combination of zinc and antioxidants.

With a focus on addressing these diverse genetic factors, this innovative formulation offers a personalized approach to support macular degeneration patients without incorporating zinc. These cutting-edge nutraceuticals have been meticulously developed to enhance overall body wellness, boost the immune system, and provide comprehensive vision support.

 

Experience the simplicity of Fortifeye Next Gen Zinc-Free Macular Defense, as it streamlines your supplement routine with just one capsule to be taken three times daily, preferably with meals. Take charge of your macular health with this tailored solution!

 

For macular degeneration patients, identifying the ideal nutritional plan involves a crucial step: ideally if available undergo a genetic DNA test designed specifically for this condition. Conducted easily in the eye care provider's office, this test enables the identification of the patient's unique genetic profile, allowing for a personalized and tailored nutritional approach.

By implementing genotype-directed nutritional therapy, considerable improvements in outcomes can be achieved for individuals facing macular degeneration. DNA testing has emerged as the gold standard in determining the most suitable supplements for each patient, ensuring targeted and effective support.

It is essential to note that nutritional experts recommend a daily zinc intake of no more than 40mg, further emphasizing the significance of personalized nutritional strategies in managing macular degeneration.

 

Fortifeye's doctors have issued specific recommendations regarding the usage of Zinc-Free Macular Defense and Macular Defense based on various circumstances:

  • If a DNA test conducted by your eye care provider indicates that zinc could potentially be harmful to your macula, it is advised to choose Zinc-Free Macular Defense.
  • Individuals who regularly consume animal proteins throughout the day generally obtain sufficient zinc from their diet and are recommended to take Zinc-Free Macular Defense.
  • Vegans, those following a plant-based diet, or individuals with minimal animal protein intake should opt for Macular Defense, which contains some zinc.
  • Alcoholics are advised to take Macular Defense, as they typically require additional zinc supplementation.
  • Patients with digestive issues such as Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis may require higher levels of zinc, making Macular Defense the preferred choice over the Zinc-Free Macular Defense.
  • Individuals taking diuretics may benefit from the zinc content in Macular Defense, making it the recommended option instead of the Zinc-Free Macular Defense.

 

These specific guidelines from Fortifeye's doctors aim to provide personalized nutritional support for individuals based on their unique needs and circumstances.  As you can see the majority of people will benefit from the next gen zinc free macular defense.

 

Before selecting any supplement, it is crucial to consult your healthcare provider or eye care professional to determine the most suitable option tailored to your specific circumstances and needs.

This supplement is manufactured in an FDA-inspected facility with NSF certification, ensuring high-quality standards. It incorporates USP-certified ingredients, meeting stringent quality criteria. The formulation of this unique new blend is firmly grounded in the latest scientific research and has been embraced by numerous individuals facing macular degeneration.

Over the course of nearly two decades, the nutrient profile of this supplement has undergone 14 reformulations, evolving to its current state.  The final formula underwent meticulous refinement through extensive clinical use with patients in leading eye care centers, complemented by serum and intracellular blood testing and retesting. This comprehensive approach ensures the utmost effectiveness and safety of the supplement.

 

This innovative formula harnesses the power of the most recent evidence-based nutrients, known for their exceptional visual support and overall health benefits. Among these are B Complex, eight variations of Vitamin E, D3, C, Saffron, resveratrol, pine bark extract, black currant fruit extract, lutein, zeaxanthin, astaxanthin, grape seed extract, coenzyme Q10, taurine, acetyl l carnitine, alpha-lipoic acid, bilberry, and curcumin. 

These carefully selected nutrients boast potent antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, which may aid in inhibiting the formation of detrimental blood vessels (anti-VEGF). The formula integrates clinically studied levels of bioavailable forms of Vitamins D, E, C, B, and chromium, ensuring optimal absorption and effectiveness.

With this powerful blend of ingredients, the formula offers valuable nutritional support for conditions like macular degeneration, diabetic retinopathy, as well as other ocular and systemic diseases. Experience the benefits of this cutting-edge formulation, designed to promote your eye health and overall well-being.

 

A comprehensive cardiovascular disease trial, involving over 5,200 women and spanning seven years, yielded fascinating results. Half of the participants were administered a daily regimen of folic acid, B-6, and B-12, while the other half received a placebo. The group receiving the vitamin supplementation experienced a remarkable 41% reduction in the occurrence of macular degeneration. This discovery holds significant implications for both individuals suffering from macular degeneration and their family members.

Further research is still required, but incorporating B complex into one's diet may prove beneficial in supporting the retina's health and overall bodily well-being. Additionally, studies suggest that B12 may offer protective benefits against conditions like cataracts, glaucoma, and optic neuropathy. Insufficient levels of B12 have been associated with memory problems, dementia, and Alzheimer's disease.

 

Moreover, B12, Folic Acid, and B6 are utilized to lower homocysteine levels, thereby potentially reducing the risk of heart attacks and strokes. This fascinating connection highlights the potential cross-benefit between cardiovascular health and ocular health through the use of these essential B vitamins. As the research unfolds, these findings open up promising avenues for improving both heart and eye health through simple dietary additions.

 

Within this advanced formula, Lutein and Zeaxanthin isomers take center stage, delivered through an innovative microbeadlet delivery system. These essential components play a crucial role in replenishing macular pigment density, providing much-needed protection against harmful blue light, and acting as potent antioxidants to combat free radicals.

 

Scientific research has indicated that macular pigment density gradually decreases as macular degeneration progresses. However, Lutein and Zeaxanthin isomers have demonstrated their efficacy in supporting both macular degeneration and potential cataracts, making them indispensable for ocular health.

Moreover, studies exploring the effects of these powerful carotenoids have unveiled their potential benefits for skin health and cognitive function, expanding the range of advantages they offer beyond just eye health.

This formula brings together the remarkable properties of Lutein, Zeaxanthin isomers (zeaxanthin and meso zeaxanthin) and astaxanthin revolutionizing the way we approach ocular health and overall well-being. This supplement contains all 4 carotenoids that are in the eye. Experience the combined benefits and embrace a healthier vision and lifestyle.

 

To support the health of mitochondria, the energy-producing organelles, and support neuroprotection, this formula incorporates Acetyl L Carnitine, Alpha Lipoic Acid, Astaxanthin, and CoQ10. These potent ingredients work in tandem to enhance cellular energy production and safeguard neural health.

In addition, the formula includes all eight forms of vitamin E (four tocopherols and four tocotrienols) to maximize the neutralization of free radicals, promoting overall antioxidant benefits.

 

One standout component is Resveratrol, a powerful polyphenol predominantly found in red wine. Its remarkable antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties have been associated with various health benefits. The "French Paradox" highlights the intriguing correlation between the French population's high saturated fat diets and their lower rates of heart disease and mortality compared to Americans. This phenomenon is partly attributed to the potential protective effects of resveratrol found in their regular consumption of red wine. Notably, resveratrol has been linked to extended lifespans and healthy aging.

Fortifeye was among the pioneers in recognizing the potential of resveratrol in the industry, incorporating it into their supplements early on. Numerous studies have explored the benefits of resveratrol for various health conditions, including recent research indicating its positive influence on eye conditions like macular degeneration, cataracts, glaucoma, and proliferative diabetic retinopathy.

 

Experience the power of this formula, carefully designed to optimize mitochondrial health, provide neuroprotection, and harness the benefits of resveratrol and other essential nutrients for your overall well-being.

 

Astaxanthin, incorporated for its exceptional ability to combat free radicals and reduce inflammation, offers remarkable benefits that surpass those of vitamin C by an astounding 550 times.

Naturally occurring in the ciliary body of the eye, Astaxanthin has been associated with reduced eye strain and improved accommodation. Studies suggest that it enhances choroidal circulation, promoting better blood flow to the eye, further supporting ocular health.

 

Beyond its eye-related advantages, Astaxanthin has been extensively studied for its potential to minimize fine lines and wrinkles, resulting in improved skin appearance. Furthermore, it has been linked to enhanced muscle endurance and faster muscle recovery, making it of interest to athletes and fitness enthusiasts.

Notably, Astaxanthin is responsible for the vibrant red color seen in wild Alaskan salmon, showcasing its powerful antioxidant properties found in nature.

Experience the outstanding benefits of Astaxanthin, a versatile and potent antioxidant, which offers multifaceted advantages for eye health, skin radiance, and physical performance.

 

The incorporation of Saffron in this formula deserves special attention, as it is renowned as the world's most expensive spice, offering remarkable health benefits for both overall well-being and ocular health. Recent clinical studies have unveiled Saffron's potential to enhance visual acuity, with patients experiencing an impressive improvement of two lines in cases of macular degeneration. Additionally, Saffron has demonstrated positive effects on ERG (electroretinogram) measurements, further supporting its role in promoting eye health.

Within this precious spice lie four exceptional antioxidants: crocin, crocetin, safranal, and kaempferol. These potent compounds contribute to Saffron's powerful antioxidant properties, making it a valuable ingredient for maintaining optimal health.

 

Saffron has proven to be an extremely safe ingredient, paving the way for its incorporation into various supplements specifically formulated for macular degeneration. Its significant potential for diverse health benefits has garnered attention, leading to its inclusion in numerous health formulations.  New science supports saffron helping to lower intra ocular pressure in the eye that may be advantageous for glaucoma. 

Scientific studies have provided substantial evidence for the positive impacts of Black Currant Fruit Extract. Its benefits include improved blood flow to the eye, relief from dry eye symptoms, enhanced dark adaptation, and a potential slowdown in the progression of visual field loss in glaucoma.

In addition to its eye-related advantages, Black Currant Fruit Extract has been the subject of research supporting a diverse range of other health benefits.

 

 

Fortifeye Next Gen Zinc Free Macular Defense proudly introduces a new addition: Pine Bark Extract. This extract is rich in three powerful polyphenols: Procyanidins, Catechins, and Phenolic Acids, which bestow potent antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and antimicrobial properties.

One notable combination of pine bark extract and bilberry has demonstrated clinical efficacy in reducing intraocular pressure in patients with glaucoma. Additionally, individuals with early-stage diabetic retinopathy who supplement with pine bark extract may experience improved retinal circulation and reduced retinal edema, offering potential protection against the devastating effects of this condition.

 

Ongoing research delves into the potential benefits of pine bark extract across various domains, encompassing Alzheimer's disease, skin health, athletic performance, cognitive enhancement, ADHD, erectile dysfunction, osteoarthritis, bone loss, and certain autoimmune conditions, among others. With such a diverse range of investigations, pine bark extract emerges as a promising nutrient for supporting healthy aging when integrated into a supplement.

Discover the versatility and potential of Pine Bark Extract, a valuable addition to Fortifeye Next Gen Zinc Free Macular Defense, unlocking a multitude of health benefits for your eyes and beyond. 

 

Bilberry, also known as European blueberry, boasts a wealth of potent antioxidants known as anthocyanins, making it a remarkable fruit with both antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties. Its historical association with fighter pilots, who consumed bilberry jam to improve night vision, adds to its intriguing qualities. Numerous patients have reported reduced eye fatigue and fewer dry eye symptoms while working on digital screens with the supplementation of bilberry. Scientific studies have also demonstrated bilberry's support for a healthy retina, enhancement of contrast sensitivity, and improvement in tear secretion. The combination of bilberry with pine bark extract has clinically been shown to lower intraocular pressure in patients, further highlighting its benefits. With these impressive qualities, bilberry becomes another excellent addition to Fortifeye Next Gen Macular Defense, providing comprehensive eye support.

 

Grape seed extract, abundant in anthocyanins, flavonoids, and oligomeric proanthocyanidins (OPCs), plays a crucial role in protecting the body against oxidative stress and inflammation. Research on grape seed extract indicates its potential protective effects against cataracts, while ongoing investigations explore its benefits for promoting retinal health, further solidifying its value in supporting overall eye health.



Taurine, an essential amino acid, is highly concentrated in vital organs like the eyes, brain, muscles, and heart. It plays a critical role in supporting the central nervous system, immune system, and overall eye health. With its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, taurine offers valuable protective effects. Additionally, research suggests taurine's potential to enhance energy levels and improve exercise performance. Studies have also indicated its benefits for the eyes, heart, hearing, brain, and liver, making it a multifaceted nutrient with significant health implications. The inclusion of taurine in Fortifeye Next Gen Macular Defense enhances its ability to provide comprehensive support for various aspects of well-being.

 

To prioritize safety and mitigate potential risks associated with excessive Vitamin A intake, this new formula has been meticulously designed without Vitamin A. Furthermore, the presence of beta carotene, commonly used as a precursor to Vitamin A, can impede the absorption of essential nutrients like Lutein, Zeaxanthin, and Astaxanthin. Therefore, Fortifeye has taken the proactive step of removing both Vitamin A and beta carotene from the formula.

Instead, this comprehensive formulation incorporates a precise blend of various nutrients, carefully balanced to ensure maximum cellular absorption. Fortifeye Next Gen Zinc Free Macular Defense can be used alone or in combination with Fortifeye Super Omega-3 or Fortifeye Focus, effectively combating free radical damage in both the eyes and the body.

With a focus on safety and efficacy, Fortifeye's advanced formula aims to support your overall well-being and ocular health, offering a comprehensive solution for optimal nutrition and protection against free radicals.

 

Combining Fortifeye Vitamins with lifestyle adjustments and dietary modifications can lead to significant improvements in both eye and overall body health. For individuals seeking proactive measures to safeguard their future well-being, Fortifeye Next Gen Zinc Free Macular Defense comes highly recommended.

This meticulously developed supplement provides comprehensive nutritional support, targeting specific nutrients in precise ratios to offer valuable assistance to the retina, optic nerve, cornea, and lens.

Fortifeye's mission with Fortifeye Next Gen Zinc Free Macular Defense is to offer the latest advancements in nutritional support for the eyes and the entire body. This supplement represents the evolution of nutritional science and will continue to evolve as new scientific discoveries emerge. By providing essential support for nutritional anti-aging, it delivers benefits to both the eyes and the entire body, ensuring a holistic approach to well-being.

What it is: Clinically proven dry eye relief: A clinical study has shown that taking 2240mg of EPA/DHA in the re-esterified triglyceride form (rTG) for 90 days results in improvement of occasional dry eye symptoms such as grittiness, dryness, and burning.

 Benefits: 

  • Significantly improves occasional dry eye discomforts such as grittiness, dryness, and burning*
  • Improves tear film quality, contributing to overall eye comfort and stable vision*
  • Ensures tears are healthy as part of creating a healthy surface for surgery
  • Provides critical nutrition to produce healthy, soothing tears
  • Can produce optimal levels of omega-3s in 90 days

Instructions: 

Three softgels once daily with a meal, or as directed by your healthcare professional

Ingredients:

Highly Refined and Concentrated Re-esterified Triglyceride Fish Oil (one or more of anchovy, sardine, herring, and mackerel), Capsule Shell (bovine gelatine, glycerin, purified water), Natural Berry/Orange Flavor, Natural Mised Tocopherols (soy derived preservative). No gluten, dairy, or artificial colors or flavors

Trust the Experts: 

We partner with your medical provider to offer home delivery for the products they recommend.

How it Works: 

Omega-3 deficient glands may become inflamed and clogged which accelerates tear evaporation and dryness due to missing oil.  Studies show that long-term consumption of 2240mg of EPA & DHA in the re-esterified triglyceride form (rTg) may help to maintain a healthy tear film and assist in overall eye comfort.¹

 

Product FAQ

Q: How does De 3 compare to store-bought fish oil?

A: De 3 contains 2240mg of EPA and DHA in an ultra-purified triglyceride (rTG) form, which is a similar form to a piece of fish, but without the impurities. This form is easier for your body to absorb and micro-distilled to remove contaminants like PCBs, lead, mercury and more.  Many store-bought omega-3s contain less than 600mg of EPA and DHA and are in a synthetic (ester) or unpurified form, which is difficult to absorb and leaves a fishy odor/aftertaste.

Q: Can I get a sufficient amount of Omega-3s from just eating fish?

A: The American Heart Association and the American Cardiology Association recommend 2-3 grams of omega-3s daily (EPA+DHA). To get this amount of Omega 3s (generally equal to 3 soft gels of PRN Omega 3s daily) from eating fish, you would have to consume the equivalent of 37 cans of tuna per week! Eating this much fish could result in an increased risk for mercury poisoning. Other fish that can be purchased in stores are mostly farm-raised which have little Omega-3s, or wild-caught, which are optimal but have an increased risk of being contaminated with harmful PCBs, dioxins, mercury, etc.

Q:Why not Flaxseed oil

A: Flaxseed contains the plant source of Omega-3s, also known as alpha-linolenic acid (ALA). This form is less easy to absorb and less effective in the body. Marine-based Omega-3s have been shown to be more absorbable which may provide systemic benefits.*

¹ Epitropoulos, Alice T. Donnenfeld, Eric D. et al, Effect of Oral Re-esterified Omega-3 Nutritional Supplementation on Dry Eyes. Cornea 2016.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Eye Vitamins to Protect and Enhance Vision

MacuHealth nourishes and replenishes the macular pigment so patients can maintain a lifetime of retinal health. Containing all three critical carotenoids in a patented 10:10:2 ratio consisting of Lutein (10mg), Meso-Zeaxanthin (10mg), and Zeaxanthin (2mg), MacuHealth is clinically proven to quickly and effectively optimize macular pigment.

Now with patented Micro-Micelle™ Technology, MacuHealth delivers statistically significant increases in carotenoid concentrations and the highest level of bioavailability studied to date.

Learn How LMZ From MacuHealth Can Benefit You

Peer-reviewed research shows MacuHealth’s proven effectiveness to replenish macular pigment. With continuous supplementation, MacuHealth improves visual performance by increasing contrast sensitivity, reducing glare and protecting eyes from harmful blue light.

Additionally, by increasing your macular pigment production, MacuHealth reduces oxidative stress and injury that free radicals from UV or blue light cause to your eyes. With this added protection, your eye’s cells are safeguarded from damage and your risk for eye diseases later in life is reduced.

Product Description


Pharmaceutical grade dietary supplement
Patented formula combines powerful antioxidants to help protect eye tissues from blue light and free radicals
Only eye supplement that contains all three carotenoids (Meso-Zeaxanthin, Lutein and Zeaxanthin) as found in the macular pigment

Uses
Supports and maintains eye health
Augments macular pigment for protection against free radicals
Enhances visual performance

Improves photo-stress recovery and contrast sensitivity
Available in
90 softgels (90-day supply)
Active Ingredients
Lutein 10 mg
Meso-Zeaxanthin 10 mg
Zeaxanthin 2 mg

A natural extract product rich in the carotenoids Lutein, Meso-Zeaxanthin and Zeaxanthin. These carotenoids are obtained from a natural source: Marigold flower petals through our patented processes. They are recommended as a food supplement to provide necessary carotenoids required for a well-balanced diet. Carotenoids are well-known for their chemical and biological properties, especially in disease prevention*.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

Inactive Ingredients


Marigold Flower Extract
Sunflower Oil – 506 mg (67.5%)
The sunflower seed is the fruit of the sunflower (Helianthus annuus). Striped sunflower seeds oil is used as a carrier by MacuHealth for the three active ingredients. The oil protects the product from being degraded by oxidation, which decreases the carotenoid content and effectiveness.
Gelatin Capsule (Gelatin, Glycerin, Purified Water, Annatto)
Gelatin 37.5 mg – This food grade and FDA sanctioned beef gelatin is used as the envelope for the manufacturing on our supplement.
Annatto – This natural red plant extract is used to create the red color of the capsule. Annatto comes from achiote shrub seeds, and is mainly used as a red food coloring. Produced in South America, achiote seeds have been used by tribes for centuries.
Yellow Beeswax
These natural ingredients allow MacuHealth to keep its product with the appropriate homogeneity.
D-Alpha Tocopherol (Vitamin E 3.75 IU (.05%)
This anti-oxidant is used by MacuHealth to slow down oxidation of the raw material thus maintaining the integrity of the product.
Tween 80
This is a nonionic surfactant and food grade emulsifier, like vinegar.
Ascorbyl Palmitate
This is an ester formed from ascorbic acid and palmitic acid creating a fat-soluble form of vitamin C. In addition to its use as a source of vitamin C, it is also used as an antioxidant food additive.
Soy Lecithin
The ingredient Soy Lecithin is widely accepted in both conventional and health food stores. It is often used as an ingredient in food products and is sold in supplement form to boost your health. Yet, surprisingly, there is a lot of confusion (and maybe even prejudgement) about soy lecithin because it includes the word “soy.” Soy lecithin does not contain sufficient soy protein residues to provoke allergic reactions in the majority of soy-allergic consumers. Many allergists do not even advise their soybean-allergic patients to avoid soybean lecithin when it is included as an ingredient on food products. Soy lecithin is an emulsifier, meaning it is used to help keep things like salad dressing stable in the bottle. Soy lecithin does not contain phytoestrogens and has no documented association with cancer risk. *CONTAINS SOY

Supplement Certified™

Supplement Certified, performed by the Nutrition Research Centre Ireland, means that the product has undergone independent 3rd party analysis to confirm that the active ingredients are present in the supplement and match their quantity label claim. Only products that are Supplement Certified can claim stability and q

Warnings

Stop use and ask a doctor if you experience eye pain, changes in vision, continued redness or irritation of the eye, or if the condition worsens or persists for more than 72 hours.

column2: Lumify Redness Reliever Eye Drops (7.5mL) with NanoDropper Adapter (7+ Month Supply, 500+ Drops)
column3:
Lumify with NanoDropper Adapter Technology

Eyedrops Are Too Big &
You Pay for the Waste

Current eyedrop bottles dispense about five times the liquid your eye can absorb. Up to 80% of every drop is wasted due to overflow onto your cheek, or drainage by the tear ducts where the medication is absorbed into the rest of your body.

Decades of clinical research has shown that smaller drops are as effective, and in many cases, safer than current drops — yet you are still forced to pay for this wasted medication.

  • Eye Drops for Red Eyes: LUMIFY significantly reduces redness to help reveal your eyes' natural radiance. From the eye care experts at Bausch and Lomb, LUMIFY works in 1 minute and lasts up to 8 hours
  • LUMIFY is different: The only OTC drop to contain brimonidine. It selectively targets redness, alleviating some potential side effects associated with other redness relief drops, when used as directed
  • LUMIFY contains no bleach or dyes. It’s the Number 1 Eye Doctor-recommended redness reliever (data on file). Contact Lens Type: Not Recommended for Contacts
  • Eye Care Experts at Bausch and Lomb: For over 150 years, we have focused on innovation and quality in eye care products, from contact lenses and solutions to eye drops, ointments, eye vitamins, and more
  • Amazing Looking Eyes: We understand how important eyes are. And despite all the eye creams, mascara, eyeliners, and eyeshadows, if your eyes are red, you won’t look your best
LUMIFY IS DIFFERENT

What’s the secret?
Alright, we’ll share.

LUMIFY is a one-of-a-kind eye drop.*

LUMIFY is a redness reliever like no other.* Before LUMIFY, redness relievers pretty much used the same ingredients for decades, and they had certain side effects. But then there was a break-through: eye doctors figured out that low-dose brimonidine tartrate could help relieve redness with a lower risk of certain side effects when used as directed. That's how low-dose brimonidine became the star ingredient in LUMIFY - and your little secret for amazing-looking eyes.

See the Drug Facts

*Low-dose OTC brimonidine

<>div>

So, how does low-dose brimonidine work?

Other redness relievers constrict the arteries in your eyes, which can deprive the eye of oxygen. And that works to relieve redness at first, but commonly causes rebound redness. Which, kind of defeats the purpose.

But low-dose brimonidine? It works differently. Low-dose brimonidine restricts the venules, which helps to relieve redness without limiting the flow of oxygen. The results? Whiter, brighter looking eyes that last up to 8 hours - with a low risk of rebound redness when used as directed.

Can I use it with other eye drops ?

What makes eye doctors choose LUMIFY?

Before LUMIFY, doctors didn't really recommend redness relieving eye drops because of their known side effects. But LUMIFY is different. Now, eye doctors have a product they can recommend to patients. Doctors like LUMIFY because of the reduced risk of rebound redness and because it uses no bleach or dyes. And it's clinically proven to be safe, effective, and not lose efficacy over time when used as directed. No wonder it's the #1 eye doctor recommended redness reliever eye drop.

How often can I use LUMIFY?

Instill one drop in each eye that needs it every 6-8 hours. Don't use more than 4 times a day. As with other OTC redness relievers, you should stop use and ask a doctor if you experience eye pain, changes in vision, redness or irritation that worsens or lasts more than 72 hours (3 days).

column2: Twenty Twenty Soothing Eye Duo, Get Growing & Easy on the Eyes (Combo)
column3:
This duo of clean, eye-friendly formulas was developed by a board-certified ophthalmologist to support your ocular health while enhancing your natural beauty. The facial mist helps sanitize skin, lids, and lashes, while the growth serum promotes thicker, fuller brows and lashes while soothing dry eyes with comforting moisture.

HOW TO USE

  • AM:
    • Start your day in a sanitary way by misting your face with Easy on the Eyes Daily Hygiene Facial Spray.
  • PM:
    • Finish your evening eye care routine by applying Get Growing Lash & Brow Serum, delivering soothing moisture and promoting healthier lashes and brows. 
    • Once you’ve fully cleansed, mist yourself again with Easy on the Eyes to help stave off any bacteria.
    • Pro Tip: The rich oils in Get Growing will break down makeup formulas, so save this serum for makeup-free days or evening use.

Results Without Sacrificing Eye Safety

This best-selling lash & brow serum helps promote the appearance of longer, fuller looking eyelashes and brows within 90 days without the use of irritating or harmful ingredients. The doctor-recommended, clean formula also helps soothe dry eyes and conditions lashes to prevent brittleness & breakage - without having to worry about any side effects or irritation. Packed with all-natural castor oil, argan oil & coconut oil, this serum is clean, safe, & irritation-free. 

Ingredient Highlights

Castor oil

Natural ingredient used by ophthalmologists as a topical dry eye treatment; contains moisturizing ricinoleic acid that promotes hair follicle health

Coconut oil

Nourishing oil packed with moisturizing fatty acids; natural antibacterial and antiviral agent

Argan oil

Hydrating oil naturally rich in linoleic acid, which has been shown to help support healthy hair growth

OUR PROMISE

Why we say NO to prostaglandin analogues

A common ingredient in popular lash growth serums, prostaglandin analogues were originally used to relieve intraocular pressure in the eye of glaucoma patients. An unintended side effect is their ability to disrupt the lash growth cycle, resulting in longer lashes. Side effects may include: eye pain and irritation, hyperpigmentation and darkening of the iris.

Our all-natural vegan formula contains just three ingredients and is safe and non-irritating.

column2: IRIS Tea Tree Cleanser Foam for Blepharitis and Dry Eye (50mL)
column3:
Revolutionize your eye care routine with Iris. This one of a kind tea tree eyelid and facial cleanser will help you maintain healthy lashes and help you maintain symptoms of chronic blepharitis and dry eye. Our formula is powered by anti-aging properties of REGU®-AGE and sodium hyaluronate. Shea butter and chamomile will help keep your eyes and face smooth and hydrated all day.

Directions: On clean hands use a single pump. lather and clean eyelashes, lids, and face. Rinse thoroughly.

FAQ

IRIS TEA TREE CLEANSER
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS ( FAQ)

1.How often can I use it?
-Our Tea tree cleanser is safe to use every day upto two to three times a day. With shea butter and chamomile it won’t dry or irritate the skin around the eyes.

2.How soon will I see results?
-Lid hygiene is a daily routine to maintain healthy eye habits, however even after the first wash you can feel your eyelids, and face soft refreshed and rejuvenated. For Best results at least two weeks or daily use is recommended.

3.Can I use it while pregnant?
-Our tea tree cleanse is a non-invasive product and all natural, completely safe to use during pregnancy and even great for children as well, unless there is an
obvious allergic reaction to tea tree oil.

4.How do I use the tea tree cleanser?
 -It’s super easy to use, on clean hands pump two pumps inside the fingertips, use the fingers to gently spread the solution on the lids and around the face. Wash with lukewarm water and dab dry with a clean towel. For best results use morning and night.

5.Are the ingredients natural?
-Our natural ingredients are safe to all ages, and we have not used animal testing in making our products.

6.Does this work for acne as well?
-Tea tree is a natural antiseptic and protectant therefore yes absolutely! It helps clear out the blemishes on the skin with continuous use and prevents further breakouts.

7.How long will the bottle last me If I use it twice a day every day?
 -Each bottle will last about 30 days with daily use.



Precautions: For external use only. Non toxic. If any irritations, discontinue use immediately.

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Polysorbate 20, Leuconostoc/Radish Root, Ferment Filtrate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Powder
